Upcoming Activities

  • EGU General Assembly. April 23-28, 2017. Vienna, Austria. Numerical simulations of the Turkish Straits System for the 2008-2013 period. (Accepted abstract for oral presentation)

Past Activities

  • 21st CESM workshop. June 20-23, 2016. Breckenridge, Colorado, USA.

  • School on Ocean Climate Modelling: Physical and Biogeochemical Dynamics of Semi- Enclosed Seas September 28 - October 1, 2015. Ankara, Turkey. Organized by ICTP

  • The 47th Liege Colloquium on Marine Environmental Monitoring, Modelling and Prediction}. May 4-8, 2015. Liege, Belgium. Presented study titled Assimilation Experiments for the Fishery Observing System in the Adriatic Sea. (invited young scientist)

  • 7th EuroGOOS conference. 28-30 October 2014. Lisbon, Portugal.

  • Advanced School on Data Assimilation. June 24-28, 2013. Bologna, Italy. Organized by Centro Euro Mediterraneo sui Cambiamenti Climatici (CMCC)

  • COS-TT GODAE Oceanview Workshop. February 4-7, 2013. Lecce, Italy. Organized by CMCC-Italy. Presented study titled Recent Performance of the Northern Levantine Circulation Model (NLEV), Sea Level Calibration and Applications

  • Coastal Modeling Summer School. September 19-23, 2011. La Londe, France. Organized by University of Toulon

  • Advanced School on Data Assimilation. June 7-11, 2010. Bologna, Italy. Organized by Centro Euro Mediterraneo sui Cambiamenti Climatici (CMCC) and Gruppo Nazionale di Oceanografia Operativa (GNOO)
